channel.title: 🏢 CMAP, UMR 7641, École Polytechnique on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 CMAP, UMR 7641, École Polytechnique on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: SCAFFLSA: Taming Heterogeneity in Federated Linear Stochastic Approximation and TD Learning
item.description: SCAFFLSA tames heterogeneity in federated learning, achieving logarithmic communication complexity and linear sample complexity.
